413850.name: CS:GO Player Profiles
413850.description: The best players are not made overnight.  Being the best of the best in CS:GO takes tremendous dedication and skill. This package contains a collection of interviews that will take you around the world and inside the lives of the CS:GO elite, offering an in depth look at the stories behind the players that are shaping the scene today.
413850.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言

categories.description: 原生支持 Steam 控制器
